oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1939-12-30 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from December 30, 1939. Featuring David Stone (announcer), George D. Hay (host), and performers Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys, Uncle Dave Macon and son Dorris Macon, Ford Rush, the Gully Jumpers, and Robert Lunn. Held at War Memorial Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Uncle Dave Macon; Roy Acuff; Smoky Mountain Boys; Ford Rush; Robert Lunn
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: New Dude In Town (Uncle Dave Macon) [continued from part 1] -- Prince Albert commercial (David Stone) -- George D. Hay introduces Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys -- Old Rattler (Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys) -- George D. Hay introduces Ford Rush -- Wonder Is All I Do (Ford Rush) -- George D. Hay introduces Robert Lunn -- Talking Blues (Robert Lunn) -- George D. Hay introduces Uncle Dave Macon -- From Jerusalem To Jericho (Uncle Dave Macon) -- Prince Albert commercial (David Stone) -- Closing theme (Charming Betsy) -- Closing statement (George D. Hay) -- Closing statement (David Stone)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Hay, George D. (George Dewey), 1895-1968; Stone, David P., 1901-1995; Acuff, Roy; Smoky Mountain Boys; Rush, Ford, 1895-; Macon, Uncle Dave, 1870-1952; Macon, Dorris; Gully Jumpers (Paul Warmack); Lunn, Robert
